metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16926 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Ohcount 3.0.0 is prone to a command injection via specially crafted filenames containing shell metacharacters, which can be exploited by an attacker (providing a source tree for Ohcount processing) to execute arbitrary code as the user running Ohcount.

criterions.comment: ohcount package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-2').
